The claim revolves around Sen: Marco Rubio's alleged contradiction in his stance on immigration reform in English versus Spanish.
Rep: Dana Rohrabacher accuses Rubio of saying one thing about border security and legalization in English and something different in a Spanish-language interview.
The Spanish: language interview on Univision's Al Punto, conducted by host Maria Elena Salinas, is at the center of the claim.
Rubio: s own website emphasizes the importance of implementing the toughest border security and enforcement plan on day one of immigration reform.
